effect.short: Raises a selected ally's Special Defense by one stage.
effect.full: Raises a selected ally's Special Defense by one stage.

flavorTexts.text:
The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon
by using a mysterious aroma.

The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon
by using a mysterious aroma.

The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally
Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.
